The organization problem, where values are being removed as options, can be turned into a factorial format. So, with 200 tiles the answer is 200! or . Enjoy!

A good practice for this would be to think about 3 books; label them x1,x2,x3. Here are the possible ways to order the books.
- x1,x2,x3
- x1,x3,x2
- x2,x1,x3
- x2,x3,x1
- x3,x1,x2
- x3,x2,x1

Notice that 3! = 6, the same as the amount of answers above.
